description: The API reference (http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html) for creating a new server has a request parameter of "networks". There is no example given on how to use this field, yet it is a key piece of information for a new instance.
title: 'networks' object is not documented anywhere

comments.content: The API reference (http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html) for creating a new server has a request parameter of "networks". There is no example given on how to use this field, yet it is a key piece of information for a new instance.
